title: Pete Davidson | Dr. Christine Blasey Ford and Brett Kavanaugh Testify: A Closer Look | Jokes Seth Can't Tell
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Dr. Christine Blasey Ford's testimony to the Senate about the allegations of sexual assault against Supreme Court nominee Brett Kavanaugh.

After that, There are some jokes that just sound wrong coming from Seth, like the one about white men being the minority among this year's Democratic midterm candidates.

Then, Pete Davidson talks about one of his rejected SNL sketches, his engagement to Ariana Grande and the pet pig they share.
